entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Xule version: 3.0.23221 -
[info] loaded in 2.20 secs at 2021-04-14T20:14:00 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/88941/000008894120000013/smtc-20201025.htm

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpqewc58ip\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0109.9568] The concept us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 with value 0.27 should always be used with both the ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis and the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis. This element has no meaning without both these axis at a minimum. This fact only contains the denominator of ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis, and not the member used on the ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis which represents the benchmark numerator. If this value represents the Concentration Risk, Threshold Percentage then use the extension element ConcentrationRiskThresholdPercentage.
The properties of this us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 fact are:
Period :2020-07-27 to 2020-10-25 Dimensions : us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis=us-gaap:SalesRevenueNetMember, srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=smtc:ProtectionMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:9568 Rule version: 15.0.0RC5 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/88941/000008894120000013/smtc-20201025.htm 4
